thread.title: Centrica extends partial injection outage at UK gas storage site
thread.title_full: Centrica extends partial injection outage at UK gas storage site

title: Centrica extends partial injection outage at UK gas storage site
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Mon, Aug 3, 2015, 13:33 BST - UK Markets close in 2 hrs 57 mins Centrica extends partial injection outage at UK gas storage site Reuters - UK Focus – 30 minutes ago 267.90 +1.4000 
Aug 3 (Reuters) - British utility Centrica (LSE: CNA.L - news ) on Monday extended an outage curbing injection capacity into the UK's biggest gas storage site Rough until 0459 GMT on Tuesday it said in a market message. 
The outage, which began on Sunday, will limit injection capacity by 20 million cubic metres/day. It had initially been expected to end at 1700 GMT. (Reporting by Oleg Vukmanovic in Milan, editing by Louise Heavens) Tax cuts, pensions, childcare, online accounts and beer duty, here's … Related Stock Articles Follow the quotes you care about most.
